Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers face the Guardians in Game 5 of the ALDS matchup
Tarik Skubal gets the start for the Tigers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers were eliminated from the playoffs after a 7-3 loss to the Guardians in Game 5
Others: The start time for Game 5 was moved up due to weather
Detroit Tigers fans once again set postseason game attendance record at Comerica Park
